# Load `tidyverse` package

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

# Classifying data types

As a first point of call, the dataset will be reduced to remove irrelevant columns.

```{r}
edu <- read.csv("./edu.csv")
edu <- edu %>% select(
  TypeOfEstablishment..code.,
  Boarders..code.,
  NumberOfPupils,
  NumberOfBoys,
  NumberOfGirls,
  PercentageFSM,
  Town,
  Gender..code.,
  PercentageFSM
)
head(edu)
```
